snippet: Ragamala Dance offered an unexpectedly contagious performance of Bharatanatyam at Lincoln Center Out of Doors.
abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews performance by Ragamala Dance with jazz composer and alto saxophonist Rudresh Mahanthappa at Damrosch Park Bandshell as part of Lincoln Center Out of Doors Festival.
lead_paragraph: Ragamala Dance offered an unexpectedly contagious performance of Bharatanatyam at Lincoln Center Out of Doors.
